title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Learner Profiling and Overcoming Technological Challenges in Remote Education

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary education-level digital device usage experience and basic social studies knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their digital competencies and technology accessibility in remote education environments
Learners can propose three or more practical problem-solving strategies for overcoming technical barriers
Learners can explain instructional design principles for developing mobile-optimized learning materials

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
